comments.en: Q6000A HP Color LaserJet black print cartridge [Add $75.00] Q6001A HP Color LaserJet cyan print cartridge [Add $82.00] Q6002A HP Color LaserJet yellow print cartridge [Add $82.00] Q6003A HP Color LaserJet magenta print cartridge [Add $82.00]

The Color LaserJet 2600n is color laser printer with a 2005 street price of $360 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2hp printer driver.

Note that GhostScript 8.14/8.15 (for example current ESP GhostScript) has a bug in the color reproduction. Use GhostScript 7.x or 8.54 to get best results. With GhostScript 8.14/8.15 use the km2430_2.icm color profile (profile for the Konica Minolta magicolor 2430 DL, will be automatically downloaded when running "getweb 2600n" after installing the foo2hp driver).
